_PAGE_PLUGIN_ICON_INTRODUCTION_:
Introduction

AIconPlugin allows you to connect a set of icons that can be used in Aloha-Vue components, such as AButton and AIcon. We recommend using icons from the aloha-svg library, which combines up-to-date SVG icons from various sources, such as Bootstrap, Flag Icons, and Tabler Icons. Icons are imported as JavaScript files.
_PAGE_PLUGIN_ICON_CONNECTION_:
Connection

Start by connecting the plugin and icons in your project:
_PAGE_PLUGIN_ICON_CONNECTION_NOTES_:
Notes

  • You can import icons from any library, but we recommend aloha-svg for convenience and up-to-date icons.
  • All registered icons will be available in components that support them through the appropriate prop.
_PAGE_PLUGIN_ICON_EXAMPLES_:
Usage Examples

Using in AButton

The AButton component supports icons through the icon-left and icon-right props.
_PAGE_PLUGIN_ICON_EXAMPLES_A_ICON_:
Using in AIcon

The AIcon component allows you to directly use registered icons.
